subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king is associated with the construction of Amber Fort?
question_hi: अमेरिका के बने किस राजा के संतुष्टि में स्थित था।
explanation_en:
Raja Jai Singh II is credited with the construction of Amber Fort, which is located in Jaipur, the capital city of Rajasthan.

English: The construction of Amber Fort is associated with Raja Jai Singh II, who was a ruler of Jaipur and the founder of the city.
Hindi: Amber की गैरहस्तांतराई महाराजा जयजीसी ईसा।

subject: Rajasthani Culture
question_en: What is the significance of Rajasthani traditional dance form 'Ghoomar'?
A_en: Ghoomar is a traditional dance form that represents the spirit and culture of Rajasthan.
B_en: Ghoomar is a dance form originating from the Jaisalmer district.
C_en: Ghoomar is a dance form performed during the Marwar Festival.
D_en: Ghoomar was popularized by the royal family of Jaisalmer.
explanation_en: The royal family of Jaisalmer played a significant role in popularizing the Ghoomar dance form.

subject: Rajasthani Culture
question_en: Who originally invented the traditional dance form 'Ghoomar'?
question_hi: गोमार को किस्मान कौन की जानार डायन
A_hi: कारणी माता गोमार को किस्मान की जानार डायन
B_hi: शांतिलाल चावां ने गोमार को जानार डायन
C_hi: दास हांसी गोमार को जानार डायन
D_en: Ghoomar was invented by Raja Man Singh I.
explanation_en: Ghoomar was invented by Raja Man Singh I, a Rajput king who ruled Rajasthan in the 19th century.
explanation_hi: राजा मन सिंग ईस, येंदर से के सिंग ईस

subject: Rajasthani Language
question_en: What is the meaning of the word 'Navrang' in Rajasthani?
question_hi: राजमणी भाष्मांदर से स्वर्ष्मांदर से सिंदर से
C_en: Navrang is a traditional dance form.
D_en: Navrang is derived from the Sanskrit word 'Nava Rasa'.
explanation_en: Navrang is derived from the Sanskrit word 'Nava Rasa', which translates to 'new emotion' or 'new mood'. In Rajasthani, it represents a unique style of dance.
